content.name: real_open
content.prop: real_open s ⟷ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ (∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ s)))

proof.args: member_empty, ∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ ∅)

proof.th: ⊢ ∀x::real. x ∈ univ ⟶ (∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ univ))
x ∈ univ ⊢ ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < 1 ⟶ x1 ∈ univ
x ∈ univ ⊢ ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < 1 ⟶ x1 ∈ univ
x ∈ univ ⊢ (0::real) < 1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < 1 ⟶ x1 ∈ univ)

proof.args: exI, {a: real}, {P: λe. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ univ), a: (1::real)}
proof.th: x ∈ univ ⊢ ∃a1. 0 < a1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < a1 ⟶ x1 ∈ univ)
⊢ ∀x::real. x ∈ univ ⟶ (∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ univ))

content.name: real_open_inter

proof.th: real_open s ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ (∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ s))
real_open t ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ t ⟶ (∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ t))
real_open s, real_open t ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ∩ t ⟶ (∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ s ∩ t))
x ∈ s ∩ t ⊢ x ∈ s ∩ t
x ∈ s ∩ t ⊢ x ∈ s ∧ x ∈ t

proof.args: conjD1, {}, {A: x ∈ s, B: x ∈ t}
conjD2, {}, {A: x ∈ s, B: x ∈ t}

proof.th: real_open s, x ∈ s ∩ t ⊢ ∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ s)
real_open t, x ∈ s ∩ t ⊢ ∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ t)

proof.args: conjD1, {}, {A: 0 < d1, B: ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s}
conjD1, {}, {A: 0 < d2, B: ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t}
conjD2, {}, {A: 0 < d1, B: ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s}
conjD2, {}, {A: 0 < d2, B: ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t}

proof.th: real_open s, real_open t, x ∈ s ∩ t, 0 < d1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s), 0 < d2 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t), 0 < e ∧ e < d1 ∧ e < d2 ⊢ ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ s ∧ x1 ∈ t
abs (x1 - x) < e ⊢ abs (x1 - x) < e

proof.args: conjD2, {}, {A: 0 < e, B: e < d1 ∧ e < d2}

proof.th: real_open s, real_open t, x ∈ s ∩ t, 0 < d1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s), 0 < d2 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t), 0 < e ∧ e < d1 ∧ e < d2, abs (x1 - x) < e ⊢ abs (x1 - x) < d1
0 < d1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s), real_open s, real_open t, x ∈ s ∩ t, 0 < d2 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t), 0 < e ∧ e < d1 ∧ e < d2, abs (x1 - x) < e ⊢ x1 ∈ s
real_open s, real_open t, x ∈ s ∩ t, 0 < d1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s), 0 < d2 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t), 0 < e ∧ e < d1 ∧ e < d2, abs (x1 - x) < e ⊢ abs (x1 - x) < d2
0 < d2 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t), real_open s, real_open t, x ∈ s ∩ t, 0 < d1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s), 0 < e ∧ e < d1 ∧ e < d2, abs (x1 - x) < e ⊢ x1 ∈ t
real_open s, real_open t, x ∈ s ∩ t, 0 < d1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s), 0 < d2 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t), 0 < e ∧ e < d1 ∧ e < d2, abs (x1 - x) < e ⊢ x1 ∈ s ∧ x1 ∈ t
real_open s, real_open t, x ∈ s ∩ t, 0 < d1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s), 0 < d2 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t), 0 < e ∧ e < d1 ∧ e < d2 ⊢ ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ s ∧ x1 ∈ t

real_open s, real_open t, x ∈ s ∩ t, 0 < d1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s), 0 < d2 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t), 0 < e ∧ e < d1 ∧ e < d2 ⊢ 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ s ∧ x1 ∈ t)

proof.args: exI, {a: real}, {P: λe. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ s ∧ x1 ∈ t), a: e}
proof.th: real_open s, real_open t, x ∈ s ∩ t, 0 < d1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s), 0 < d2 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t), 0 < e ∧ e < d1 ∧ e < d2 ⊢ ∃a1. 0 < a1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < a1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s ∧ x1 ∈ t)

proof.args: member_inter_iff, ∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ s ∩ t)
proof.th: real_open s, real_open t, x ∈ s ∩ t, 0 < d1 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d1 ⟶ x1 ∈ s), 0 < d2 ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < d2 ⟶ x1 ∈ t), 0 < e ∧ e < d1 ∧ e < d2 ⊢ ∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ s ∩ t)
real_open s, real_open t ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ∩ t ⟶ (∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ s ∩ t))
real_open s, real_open t ⊢ real_open (s ∩ t)
⊢ real_open s ⟶ real_open t ⟶ real_open (s ∩ t)

content.prop: real_open s --> real_open t--> real_open (inter s t)

proof.th: x ∈ {x1. a < x1} ⊢ ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x) ⟶ a < x1
abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x) ⊢ abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x)
x ∈ {x1. a < x1}, abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x) ⊢ a < x1
x ∈ {x1. a < x1} ⊢ ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x) ⟶ a < x1
x ∈ {x1. a < x1} ⊢ 0 < abs (a - x) ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x) ⟶ a < x1)

proof.args: exI, {a: real}, {P: λe. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ a < x1), a: abs (a - x)}
member_collect, ∃e. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ {x2. a < x2})

proof.th: x ∈ {x1. x1 < a} ⊢ ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x) ⟶ x1 ∈ {x2. x2 < a}
abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x) ⊢ abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x)
abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x), x ∈ {x1. x1 < a} ⊢ x1 < a
x ∈ {x1. x1 < a}, abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x) ⊢ x1 ∈ {x2. x2 < a}
x ∈ {x1. x1 < a} ⊢ ∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x) ⟶ x1 ∈ {x2. x2 < a}
x ∈ {x1. x1 < a} ⊢ 0 < abs (a - x) ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < abs (a - x) ⟶ x1 ∈ {x2. x2 < a})

proof.args: exI, {a: real}, {P: λe. 0 < e ∧ (∀x1. abs (x1 - x) < e ⟶ x1 ∈ {x2. x2 < a}), a: abs (a - x)}
{p. a < p ∧ p < b} = {p. a < p} ∩ {p. p < b}

steps.goal: {p. a < p ∧ p < b} = inter {p. a < p}  {p. p < b}

description: Formalization of general topological and metric spaces. Refer to metric.ml from HOL Light.
name: metric
